_field_block.name: data

_field_real.name: AI infantry-on-AI weapon damage scale:[0,1]#Global scale on weapon damage made by AI on other AI
AI vehicle-on-AI weapon damage scale:[0,1]#Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle on other AI
AI player vehicle-on-AI weapon damage scale:[0,1]#Global scale on weapon damage made by AI in a vehicle with the player on other AI

_field_block._field_explanation: The maximum ranges to which firing point evaluations will do pathfinding searches. INCREASING THESE VALUES WILL ALMOST CERTAINLY HAVE A NEGATIVE IMPACT ON PERFORMANCE.

_field_real.name: scary target threhold#A target of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)
scary weapon threhold#A weapon of this scariness is offically considered scary (by combat dialogue, etc.)
invincible scariness#when an actor's target is invincible, he is this much more scared

_field_block._field_explanation: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to ressurect.

_field_real.name: min death time:seconds#I will be dead for at least this long
projectile distance:wu#If there is a projectile within this distance of me, I'll stay dead
idle clump distance:wu#If there is any enemy clump within this distance of me, I'll stay dead
dangerous clump distance:wu#If there is any enemy clump with a status higher than idle within this distance of me, I'll stay dead

_field_block._field_explanation: A few properties to help define when it is safe for a mission critical character to teleport.

_field_real.name: cover search duration:seconds#The number of seconds that must elapse before we try to look for a firing point behind cover to teleport to.
task direction search duration:seconds#The number of seconds we try to look for a firing point that aligns us with the actor's task direction.

_field_block._field_explanation: Some values to help you control how much guys will throttle when they want to stick with the rest of their squad.

_field_real.name: stop dist:wu#At this distance from the squad, stop.
resume dist:wu#At this distance from the squad, start again.
min dist:wu#Start throttling back at this distance
max dist:wu#Maximum trottle scale at this distance
passthrough chance#Chance of passing through a patrol objective without pausing
search phase skip chance#Chance of skipping the search phase when stopped at a patrol objective
patrol transition timeout:seconds#If the squad takes more than this time to get to their new patrol point, cancel it and go on to the next.
patrol maneuver timeout:seconds#If the squad takes longer than this time to reposition within a patrol point (e.g. searching and pausing), cancel the point and go on to the next.

_field_real_bounds.name: patrol search firing point time:seconds#spend this amount of time at a search firing position when in search phase

_field_real.name: patrol isolation distance:wus#If you are more than this distance from your nearest squadmate, you are officially isolated.
patrol isolation time:seconds#If you are isolated for more than this time, you get deleted.

_field_block._field_explanation: These parameters control how the kung-fu circle works (i.e. when tasks have kungfu-count associated with them)

_field_real.name: kungfu deactivation delay:seconds#When a task is disallowed from shooting, turn it off after this delay

_field_custom.name: Presearch Child Counts (0 means no limit)

_field_block.name: vision traits
_field_block._field_explanation: Traits that affect the AI's vision

_field_real.name: vision distance scale#Scale the distance at which an AI can see their target.
vision angle scale#Scale the angles of the AI's vision cone.

_field_block.name: sound traits
_field_block._field_explanation: Traits that affect the AI's sound awareness

_field_real.name: hearing distance scale#Scale the character's hearing distance.

_field_block.name: luck traits
_field_block._field_explanation: Traits that affect the AI's luck

_field_real.name: evasion chance scale#Scale the chance of evading fire.
grenade dive chance scale#Scale the chance of diving from grenades.
broken kamikaze chance scale#Scale the chance of going kamikaze when broken.
leader dead retreat chance scale#Scale the chance of retreating when your leader dies.
dive retreat chance scale#Scale the chance of retreating after a dive.
shield depleted berserk chance scale#Scale the chance of berserking when your shield is depleted.
leader abandoned berserk chance scale#Scale the chance of a leader berserking when all his followers die.
melee attack delay timer scale#Scale the time between melee attacks.
melee chance scale#Scale the chance of meleeing.
melee leap delay timer scale#Scale the delay for performing melee leaps.
throw grenade delay scale#Scale the time between grenade throws.

_field_block.name: grenade traits
_field_block._field_explanation: Traits that affect the AI's grenade use

_field_real.name: velocity scale#Scale the velocity at which AI throws grenades
throw grenade delay scale#Scale the time between grenade throws.

_field_short_integer_bounds.name: search pattern cells per shell range
